rules_text:
{W}{B} YOG The God of Balance is aggressive with his boons and blessings.
{B}{G} CORVASH Death is but the beginning for the truly strong.
{G}{U} GEESH May the blessings of Geesh proliferate far and wide.
{U}{R} VO’RADH Invoke spells from your graveyard and find true power.
{R}{W} CHURCH OF THE EAGLE Arm yourself with faith and prayer and win with prowess.
{W}{U} ARTIFACTS Trinkets and relics of great power fuel your coven.
{U}{B} FEROCIOUS Strength may come in numbers, but your creatures excel by themselves.
{B}{R} SACRIFICE Life is cheap and death is plentiful. Benefit from this mortality.
{R}{G} MUTANTS Not all are blessed in the same way; embrace your mutant kin.
{G}{W} COUNTERS Forge your faith strong and true with +1/+1 counters.
